PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13172024-12-13ECCC, HC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectClean Electricity Regulations
PrecisCLEAN ELECTRICITY REGULATIONS in order to prohibit emissions above an annual emissions limit from fossil fuel fired electricity generation starting in 2035 to reach net-zero in 2050.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0263 Publication Date: 2024-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
